title: The labor problem with climate change
description: Three words: Buy heat pumps. Wired Reporter Matt Simon joins Chuck Todd to discuss the strengths, and the limits, of technology when it comes to tackling climate change.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
